meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with rockrose flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful rockroses.
meanings.sent2: I picked some rockroses to put in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the rockroses in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a field of rockroses in spring.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the rockroses brightened up the landscape.

meanings.definition: The rockrose plant or its flowers.
meanings.sent1: The rockroses in the park smelled sweet and fragrant.
meanings.sent2: She admired the delicate petals of the rockroses.
meanings.sent3: The rockroses seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as pure and beautiful as the rockroses.
meanings.sent5: The rockroses added a touch of elegance to the garden.
